description: Grants permission to close an existing case.

parameters.name: caseId
parameters.description: Required element used in combination with CloseCase to identify the case ID to close.

nested_items.name: caseStatus
nested_items.description: A response element providing responses for requests to CloseCase. This element responds with the case status following the action.

nested_items.name: closedDate
nested_items.description: A response element providing responses for requests to CloseCase. This element responds with the case closure date following the action.
